channel.title: Against the Dark Conspiracy - Praise from Caesar is praise indeed
channel.description: I'd have no objection to everyone retweeting this endorsement of Against the Dark Conspiracy from Ken Hite (https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/atdc/against-the-dark-conspiracy-zinequest-3) ... my heart swells! https://twitter.com/kennethhite/status/1362646308423675905?s=09

item.title: Against the Dark Conspiracy - Praise from Caesar is praise indeed
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Wow! We hit a stretch goal … there’ll be detail of a Demonic Conspiracy with some different motives, powers and supernatural proxies added to the default Vampire Conspiracy. 54 hours to reach the Fae Conspiracy and beyond …
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/atdc/against-the-dark-conspiracy-zinequest-3

Read full topic
item.source: Against the Dark Conspiracy - Praise from Caesar is praise indeed
